analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/43/0x912a209540221579fbc434ae9da90581ce5ff8e3.sol:
	Contract FixedSupplyToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/43/0x912a209540221579fbc434ae9da90581ce5ff8e3.sol#376-378)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/43/0x912a209540221579fbc434ae9da90581ce5ff8e3.sol#136) is not in mixedCase
